post.author: printz
post.body: Can Doom be turned into a RTS by introducing a mouse interface and a terrain-like map design? Could be neat with all the models available. Could give Doom 3 a pretty good name too .

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Like "Doom Commander"?
(make a quick search with this name, you will find what you're looking for...)
